low.question: When did Christopher Columbus first reach the Americas?
In what year did the Declaration of Independence get adopted by the United States?
When did the French Revolution begin with the storming of the Bastille?
In what year did World War I begin?
When did World War II officially start in Europe with Germany's invasion of Poland?
When was the Berlin Wall constructed, dividing East and West Berlin?
In what year did the American Civil War begin?
When did the Russian Revolution that overthrew the Tsar start (February Revolution)?
When did Napoleon Bonaparte crown himself Emperor of the French?
In what year did the Titanic sink after hitting an iceberg?
When did the United Nations officially come into existence?
In what year did India gain independence from Britain?
When did the Spanish Armada attempt to invade England?
When was the Magna Carta originally sealed by King John?
When did the Protestant Reformation begin with Martin Luther's 95 Theses?
In what year did the Bill of Rights become part of the U.S. Constitution?
When was the first successful powered flight by the Wright brothers?
When did the Great Fire of London occur?
When was the Emancipation Proclamation issued by Abraham Lincoln?
When did Japan attack Pearl Harbor, bringing the U.S. into World War II?
In what year did the Korean War begin?
When was Nelson Mandela released from prison?
When did the Ottoman Empire fall, formally ending after World War I?
When did the Soviet Union dissolve?
When was the first modern Olympic Games held in Athens?
When was the printing press invented by Johannes Gutenberg (approximate year)?
In what year did the Bolsheviks seize power in the October Revolution?
When did the Suez Canal officially open?
When was the Six-Day War between Israel and neighboring states?
When did the Black Death peak in Europe?

medium.question: When was the Battle of Hastings, which changed English monarchy?
In what year did the Treaty of Versailles formally end World War I?
When did the Indian Rebellion (Sepoy Mutiny) against the British East India Company begin?
When was the Battle of Waterloo where Napoleon was finally defeated?
In what year did the Cuban Missile Crisis occur, bringing Cold War tension to a peak?
When did the Berlin Airlift start in response to the Soviet blockade?
When was the Zimmermann Telegram sent, influencing U.S. entry to World War I?
When did the Taiping Rebellion begin in China, one of the deadliest conflicts?
In what year did the Spanish Civil War begin?
When did the Irish Potato Famine begin, drastically affecting Ireland's population?
When was the Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen adopted in France?
In what year did Vasco da Gama reach India by sea, opening a sea route?
When did the Ottoman siege of Constantinople end, marking the city's fall?
When was the Manhattan Project's first successful test detonation (Trinity)?
In what year did the English Civil War begin between Royalists and Parliamentarians?
When did the Meiji Restoration begin transforming Japan into a modern state?
When was the first successful vaccine for smallpox developed by Edward Jenner?
When was the Oslo Accords first signed between Israel and the PLO?
In what year did the Berlin Wall fall, signaling the end of Cold War divisions?
When did Ferdinand Magellan's expedition successfully complete the first circumnavigation (return year)?
When did South Africa hold its first multiracial democratic election electing Mandela?
When was the Warsaw Pact formed as a Soviet-led military alliance?
When did the First Opium War between Britain and China begin?
In what year did the Great Depression begin with the U.S. stock market crash?
When did the Norman conquest transform England's ruling class?
When was the League of Nations officially established after World War I?
When did the Haitian Revolution successfully end in independence from France?
When was the Panama Canal officially opened for ship traffic?
When did the Russian civil war effectively end with Bolshevik consolidation?
When did the Battle of Stalingrad begin, marking a turning point in WWII?

hard.question: When did the Edict of Milan grant religious tolerance to Christians in the Roman Empire?
In what year did the Council of Trent, shaping Catholic Counter-Reformation, begin?
When was the Treaty of Tordesillas signed dividing New World claims between Spain and Portugal?
When did Hongwu establish the Ming dynasty after expelling the Mongols?
When did Tokugawa Ieyasu achieve victory at Sekigahara, leading to Edo shogunate?
When did the Glorious Revolution replace James II with William and Mary in England?
When was the Treaty of Westphalia signed, marking end of Thirty Years' War?
When did Hernán Cortés begin the Spanish conquest of the Aztec Empire with arrival in Mexico?
When did the English Bill of Rights become law, limiting the monarchy's power?
When was the Battle of Tours where Charles Martel halted Muslim expansion into Europe?
In what year did the Babylonian king Nebuchadnezzar II destroy Jerusalem's First Temple (approx.)?
When did Suleiman the Magnificent begin his reign over the Ottoman Empire?
When did the Battle of Lepanto, a major naval engagement, occur?
When was Constantinople officially renamed Istanbul by the Ottomans (de facto usage)?
When did the Norman conquest of southern Italy and Sicily largely complete under Roger II?
When did the Code of Hammurabi get compiled in ancient Mesopotamia (approx.)?
When did the Reconquista in Spain conclude with the fall of Granada?
When was the Peace of Augsburg allowing princes to choose Lutheranism or Catholicism?
When did Vasco Núñez de Balboa first sight the Pacific Ocean from the New World?
When did the fall of the Western Roman Empire traditionally occur with Romulus Augustulus' deposition?
When was the Battle of Agincourt fought during the Hundred Years' War?
When did the Haitian slave revolt begin under Toussaint L'Ouverture's influence (initial uprising)?
When did the Ming dynasty complete Zheng He's final voyages before the fleet was retired?
When did the An Lushan Rebellion begin in Tang dynasty China?
When was the Battle of Yorktown, effectively ending major fighting in the American Revolution?
When did the Mongol Empire reach its greatest extent under Kublai Khan's rule (established Yuan)?
When was the Edict of Fontainebleau revoking the Edict of Nantes issued in France?
When did the Battle of Chanakya's successors defeat the Seleucid forces leading to Mauryan expansion (approx.)?
When did the Treaty of Nanking end the First Opium War, ceding Hong Kong to Britain?
When did the Ottoman Sultan Mehmed II capture Constantinople, marking a shift in trade routes?
When did the Tonkin Gulf Resolution, escalating U.S. involvement in Vietnam, pass?
